columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The state of the last provisioning operation performed on the search service.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the search service. Possible values include: 'running', deleting', 'provisioning', 'degraded', 'disabled', 'error' etc.

columns.name: status_details
columns.description: The details of the search service status.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource.

columns.name: hosting_mode
columns.description: Applicable only for the standard3 SKU. You can set this property to enable up to 3 high density partitions that allow up to 1000 indexes, which is much higher than the maximum indexes allowed for any other SKU. For the standard3 SKU, the value is either 'default' or 'highDensity'. For all other SKUs, this value must be 'default'. Possible values include: 'Default', 'HighDensity'.

columns.name: partition_count
columns.description: The number of partitions in the search service; if specified, it can be 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, or 12. Values greater than 1 are only valid for standard SKUs. For 'standard3' services with hostingMode set to 'highDensity', the allowed values are between 1 and 3.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: This value can be set to 'enabled' to avoid breaking changes on existing customer resources and templates. If set to 'disabled', traffic over public interface is not allowed, and private endpoint connections would be the exclusive access method. Possible values include: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: replica_count
columns.description: The number of replicas in the search service. If specified, it must be a value between 1 and 12 inclusive for standard SKUs or between 1 and 3 inclusive for basic SKU.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The SKU of the Search Service, which determines price tier and capacity limits. This property is required when creating a new search service.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the search service.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the resource.

columns.name: network_rule_set
columns.description: Network specific rules that determine how the azure cognitive search service may be reached.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: The list of private endpoint connections to the azure cognitive search service.

columns.name: shared_private_link_resources
columns.description: The list of shared private link resources managed by the azure cognitive search service.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
